attributes.action: Hold a 2020 Live Aid to raise money for climate change.
attributes.additional_details: Bob Geldof, or any artists to arrange for a 2020 live concert at the legendary Wembley Stadium for a crucial cause.
attributes.background: The first Live Aid concert was iconic, and it spread a powerful message around the world. This time, let’s fight the cause that’s closest to home for all of us. Our planet is taking brutal damage because of our actions - it’s time to give back and save our globe.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on artists to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament.
